base_description: Compact, rectangular, black and silver refrigerator.
part_description: Features a front door with handle, rectangular shape, compact size, and a flat top surface. The door is centrally positioned with a handle at the top.
internal_interaction_description: The door, when opened, allows access to the internal storage compartments. The handle facilitates easy opening and closing. The internal compartments are designed to organize and store items efficiently, utilizing vertical space.
external_interaction_description: The refrigerator interacts with users who open the door to store or retrieve items. It requires an external power source to operate, and its flat top can hold lightweight objects. Positioned in kitchens or similar spaces, it integrates with surrounding cabinetry.
